name: Dread Troll
description: The Dread Troll is a large and fearsome creature known for its incredible strength and regenerative abilities. It features a robust physique, capable of withstanding significant damage.
memorable: Its unique Severed Limbs ability allows it to control its lost extremities and continue fighting even when severely injured.
goals: To overpower adversaries in combat and use its regeneration to survive battles.
relations: Could be found alongside other trolls or as a solitary predator.
environment: Typically found in dark forests or mountainous regions.
strengths: High physical damage output with multiple attacks and significant hit point pool; can regenerate health unless affected by fire or acid.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire and acid damage, which temporarily halts its regeneration.
attacks: Can make two bite attacks and three claw attacks in a single turn.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration, allowing it to regain hit points unless it suffers fire or acid damage.
senses: Possesses Keen Smell, granting advantage on Perception checks based on smell.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing it to ambush unsuspecting foes.
additional_information: Has the ability to control severed limbs with their own hit points.
If the troll loses a limb, it can reattach it as a bonus action.
Severed limbs can continue to attack independently.
High Constitution ensures excellent durability in combat.
Struggles with intelligence, making it less versatile in non-combat situations.

formidable giant with keen smell in the forest
large troll that regains health each turn
resilient creature vulnerable to fire and acid
